title: Ianni
description: Ianni gave up her angelic existence to save a human soul. Killing the Dark Guides caused her to be banished from Heaven. Now she will be sent to earth to live as a human. But becoming a human is complicated. She must learn their ways and try to let go of her past life as a Spirit Guide. As if that wasn’t hard enough, now she learns there is a new threat to her friends. Will Ianni strive in her new skin or fail miserably?Follow Ianni’s new path in this novella of The Past Lives Series. Don’t miss the first book in this intriguing series The Many Lives of Avery Snow.
author: Christy Sloat
